Hi Moti! I'm doing well, thanks. How are you doing? How's the work going?That's fantastic! The excitement is real now! 

So what's left on the checklist before you can ship? Are you in that final polish phase, or still tackling some core pieces?Ah yes - we're here every day now with the full context! And I imagine you're starting to think about the launch strategy itself - how you want to introduce this to the world?
